welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mackay, where you'll find a perfect blend of natural beauty, charming city vibes, and coastal adventures. Get ready to immerse yourself in the laid-back atmosphere and discover the stunning beaches, lush rainforests, and vibrant local culture that make Mackay a unique and unforgettable destination. Enjoy your stay and make the most of all that this wonderful city has to offer!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mackay Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Mackay Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated for private jet arrivals and departures.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brampton Island Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
